# Interface TelemetryConfigInterface

Configuration for telemetry

interface TelemetryConfigInterface {  
apiKey: string;  
appName?: string;  
appVersion?: string;  
endpoint?: string;  
exporterType?: [ExporterType](/enums/telemetry.ExporterType);  
logger?: [LoggerConfigInterface](./telemetry.LoggerConfigInterface);  
tracer?: [TracerConfigInterface](./telemetry.TracerConfigInterface);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

apiKey appName? appVersion? endpoint? exporterType? logger? tracer?

## Properties

### apiKey

apiKey: string

The API key for telemetry

### `Optional`appName

appName?: string

The name of the application Used as [service.name](http://service.name) and [app.name](http://app.name) in telemetry attributes

### `Optional`appVersion

appVersion?: string

The version of the application Used as service.version and app.version in telemetry attributes

### `Optional`endpoint

endpoint?: string

The endpoint for telemetry

### `Optional`exporterType

exporterType?: [ExporterType](/enums/telemetry.ExporterType)

The metrics configuration to use for telemetry

### `Optional`logger

logger?: [LoggerConfigInterface](./telemetry.LoggerConfigInterface)

The logger configuration to use for telemetry

### `Optional`tracer

tracer?: [TracerConfigInterface](./telemetry.TracerConfigInterface)

The tracer to use for telemetry

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
